title: Sinful Sugar
description:
Mayhem is coming for the Knight's Legion MC: Minnesota…
Art. My defender.The balm to my broken soul.I thought true love only came once in a lifetime. Then a younger, sinfully handsome, wildly addictive tattoo artist shows me I am wrong.Art possesses and pleasures me in all the ways I desire. He is relentless and willing to take on the world to make me his. But it’s the Knight’s Legion MC he must answer to—and my sons. Can I risk it all for him?Denying my heart is impossible. I’m ready to reveal our sinful secret to my sons and the club. But before I can, the choice is taken out of my hands.Will Art rescue me before it’s too late? Will he fight to the death so we can be together, or will our forbidden love perish like everything else in my life?
Sinful Sugar
 is the eighth novel in the Knight's Legion MC, the gritty and suspenseful romance series of a rural Minnesota motorcycle club. Take a ride today! WARNING: This book contains dark elements that may be triggering to some readers. Discretion advised.
author: Naomi Porter
